Another great option could be "You". In this movie, a young man named Ben has no memories of how he got to this point. He starts having strange dreams about going back in time. With the help of his best friend, Barry, and a mysterious woman, Marcy, Ben embarks on a dangerous journey through time in order to uncover the truth about his past.
I hope these recommendations are helpful!

Based on your preferences, I would highly recommend "Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid" directed by George Roy Hill.
The movie follows the adventures of Butch Cassidy and his band of outlaws as they navigate through the wild west during the mid 1800's.
The movie features an outstanding cast including:
- Butch Cassidy played by Paul Newman
- Joe Garcy played by Robert Redford
- Bill Sykes played by Keivan Key
- Soco played by Stellan Skarsgard
- Tonya played by Pam Anderson
- Dan Quaid played by Jeff Bridges
- Old Bill played by John McCallum
The movie was a huge success and is still considered one of the greatest westerns movies ever made.
Overall, "Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid" directed by George Roy Hill is an outstanding classic western movie that I would highly recommend to anyone who enjoys classic western movies.
